participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Disciplined and patriotic, with a strong sense of duty.
participant_1.background: i live in canada. i didn't graduate high school. i'm in the army. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, with a passion for music and dance.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.

content.text: Hello, my name is john. How are you?
